name: Dangerous Treasure
description:
Find the treasure at the bottom of the sea, but beware of the sharks!

Controls: WASD or Arrow keys

R to Restart & Tab to Quit

I made this game within 24 hours as I didn't have an idea until very late, so the game lacking in some aspects.

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

Bug fix 27.4.2021 - Fixed bug where players could go out of bounds

Bug fix 28.4.2021 - Fixed bug with the sharks detection system

_____________________________________________________________________________________________

All assets, music and programming was made by me, with the exception of  a color palette texture by Imphenzia.
